languages.text: "Но знаете, {name}, я ни о чем не жалею. И никогда не забуду бесценных мгновений, что мы провели вместе". {n}Девушка глубоко вздыхает и дарит свою последнюю ласковую улыбку.{/n} "Мне больше нечего вам сказать, {name}. Увидимся... позже".

traits.locale_text: "Но знаете, {name}, я ни о чем не жалею. И никогда не забуду бесценных мгновений, что мы провели вместе". {n}Девушка глубоко вздыхает и дарит свою последнюю ласковую улыбку.{/n} "Мне больше нечего вам сказать, {name}. Увидимся... позже".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."
languages.original_text: "Но знаете, {name}, я ни о чем не жалею. И никогда не забуду бесценных мгновений, что мы провели вместе". {n}Девушка глубоко вздыхает и дарит свою последнюю ласковую улыбку.{/n} "Мне больше нечего вам сказать, {name}. Увидимся... позже".

traits.locale_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I will never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last affectionate smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I will see you... later."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I will never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last affectionate smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I will see you... later."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “但是，{name}，我从不后悔。我永远不会忘记我们一同度过的美好时光。”{n}她深吸了一口气，最后给你留下一个温柔的微笑。{/n}“我的话已经说完了，{name}……再见了。”
languages.original_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."

traits.locale_text: “但是，{name}，我从不后悔。我永远不会忘记我们一同度过的美好时光。”{n}她深吸了一口气，最后给你留下一个温柔的微笑。{/n}“我的话已经说完了，{name}……再见了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Aber wisst Ihr, {name} ... Ich bereue nichts. Und ich werde die kostbaren Momente mit Euch niemals vergessen." {n}Sie atmet tief durch und schenkt dir ihr letztes zartes Lächeln.{/n} "Mehr habe ich nicht zu sagen, {name}. Wir sehen uns ... später."
languages.original_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."

traits.locale_text: "Aber wisst Ihr, {name} ... Ich bereue nichts. Und ich werde die kostbaren Momente mit Euch niemals vergessen." {n}Sie atmet tief durch und schenkt dir ihr letztes zartes Läücheln.{/n} "Mehr habe ich nicht zu sagen, {name}. Wir sehen uns ... später."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Mais vous savez quoi, {name} ? Je ne regrette rien. Et jamais je n'oublierai les précieux moments que nous avons passés ensemble. » {n}Elle inspire profondément et vous adresse son dernier sourire tendre.{/n} « Je n'ai rien de plus à ajouter, {name}. Nous nous reverrons... plus tard. »
languages.original_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."

traits.locale_text: « Mais vous savez quoi, {name} ? Je ne regrette rien. Et jamais je n'oublierai les précieux moments que nous avons passés ensemble. » {n}Elle inspire profondément et vous adresse son dernier sourire tendre.{/n} « Je n'ai rien de plus à ajouter, {name}. Nous nous reverrons... plus tard. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Pero sabe, {name}... No me arrepiento de nada. Y nunca olvidaré los preciosos momentos que pasamos juntos». {n}Respira hondo y te dedica su última y tierna sonrisa.{/n} «No tengo nada más que decir, {name}. Le veré... más tarde».
languages.original_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."

traits.locale_text: «Pero sabe, {name}... No me arrepiento de nada. Y nunca olvidaré los preciosos momentos que pasamos juntos». {n}Respira hondo y te dedica su última y tierna sonrisa.{/n} «No tengo nada más que decir, {name}. Le veré... más tarde».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「でも分かるでしょう、{name}様…あたくしは何も後悔していません。それにあたくしは、一緒に過ごした素晴らしい時を、決して忘れません」{n}彼女は深く息をつくと、あなたに最後の優しい微笑みを見せる。{/n}「{name}様、これ以上言うことはありません。また会いましょう…後で」
languages.original_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."

traits.locale_text: 「でも分かるでしょう、{name}様…あたくしは何も後悔していません。それにあたくしは、一緒に過ごした素晴らしい時を、決して忘れません」{n}彼女は深く息をつくと、あなたに最後の優しい微笑みを見せる。{/n}「{name}様、これ以上言うことはありません。また会いましょう…後で」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "But you know, ... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, . I shall see you... later."

languages.text: "Ancak şunu bil {name}... Hiç pişman değilim. Birlikte geçirdiğimiz o güzel anları hep güzel yâd edeceğim." {n}Derin bir nefes alıp sana son kez, nazikçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Başka söyleyeceğim yok {name}. Sonra... Görüşürüz."
languages.original_text: "But you know, {name}... I regret nothing. And I shall never forget the precious moments we spent together." {n}She takes a deep breath and gives you her last tender smile.{/n} "I have no more to say, {name}. I shall see you... later."
